sub_title: Freelance Ontwerper / Kunstenaar. Ondersteunt graag bij het beeldend vertellen van jouw verhaal.
summary:
Laurens van Walbeek werkt aan opvallende creatieve projecten voor leuke vrienden in de kunst- en cultuursector. 

Met creatieve projecten voor o.a. KRO-NCRV, Oost Wanted, MINKA, Hedon, Cultuurpodium De Pul,  Wildeburg Festival, Cibap, De Kraaien, KINK, URBN Village, Corneel en BNN-VARA. 

Laurens organiseert ook workshops, is een grote nerd, en presenteert ook samen met Wytse de Achterhalen Podcast.

projects.title: SNEAK SNEAK environment animation
projects.description: SneakSneak is a new co-operative 2D sneaking game. Playable on PC with 2 Xbox controllers. At the 2012 Dutch Game Awards it recieved an award for Best Student Game, and an honourable mention at the 2013 IGF Award student showcase. Currently under development by Frambosa.

projects.title: CLOSING TIME
projects.description:
Closing Time is an animated short movie by student Laurens van Walbeek.

The release date is set for july 4th 2014.
Beschrijving
Closing Time is an animated student short movie, created by student 
Laurens van Walbeek.

The movie was made during a period of closing things up, such as a part of youth, student ship and overall certainty.

The creator has had nostalgic feelings towards working with analog materials such as cardboard, and had made a lot of stuff with it as a child while sleeping over at his grandparents' house.

Directed & Animated by Laurens van Walbeek
Music and Sound Design by Zuurstof (Marc Stumpel)

profile_positions.description:
Grafisch ontwerp packaging voor diverse Goliath Games; Toys en Games consumentenproducten wereldwijd. Deel van het Nederlandse R&D team. Online samenwerking met o.a. UK en US.

Packaging Design, Manuals, Logo design

Voornamelijk meegewerkt aan Puzzles That's Life Gallery Editions Vermeer, Van Gogh, Mondriaan. 
Game Alien in a Sock, Ternet Ninja en Yofinity.

profile_positions.description:
Met veel plezier les gegeven op het Cibap. 
DIGI, OM en DTP. Ervaring in educatie in Motion design, digitale vaardigheden, conceptueel ontwerpen, grafische vormgeving en DTP.

Software: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Indesign, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Animate, Unity en Sketchup
